title: Show 56 - Kings of Kings
itunes:title: Kings of Kings
description: Often relegated to the role of slavish cannon fodder for Sparta's spears, the Achaemenid Persian empire had a glorious heritage. Under a single king they created the greatest empire the world had ever seen.
itunes:subtitle: Often relegated to the role of slavish cannon fodder for Sparta's spears, the Achaemenid Persian empire had a glorious heritage. Under a single king they created the greatest empire the world had ever seen.
itunes:summary: Often relegated to the role of slavish cannon fodder for Sparta's spears, the Achaemenid Persian empire had a glorious heritage. Under a single king they created the greatest empire the world had ever seen.
itunes:keywords: Cyrus, Iran, Persia, Greek, Greece, Xerxes, Assyria, Babylon, Bible, Biblical, ancient, history, Spartans, Athens, Greek and Persian Wars, Medes, Scythians, Herodotus, Elamites
